SEARCH
Module VetAppointmentPortal
Package com.vetportal.dao

Class BaseDAO<T>

java.lang.Object
com.vetportal.dao.BaseDAO<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the entity type this DAO manages
All Implemented Interfaces:
GenericDAO<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AppointmentDAO, CustomerDAO, EmployeeDAO, PetDAO
public abstract class BaseDAO<T> extends Object implements GenericDAO<T>
Base abstract DAO implementation providing common CRUD operations. Child classes should extend this to use for core functionality only implementing entity-specific methods.

  • Constructor Details

    • BaseDAO

      public BaseDAO(Connection connection, EntityMapper<T> mapper)
      Constructs a new BaseDAO with the given database connection and entity mapper. Ensures that foreign key constraints are enabled.
      Parameters:
      connection - the shared active database connection
      mapper - the entity mapper for converting between database records and Java class attributes

  • Method Details

    • getOrderedAttributes

      protected abstract List<String> getOrderedAttributes()
      Returns the ordered list of database column names for this entity type. Used to construct SQL statements because column order matters
      Returns:
      a list of database column names in the order they must appear in SQL statements for the table corresponding to this entity

    • setCreateStatement

      protected abstract void setCreateStatement(PreparedStatement statement, T entity) throws SQLException
      Sets parameters for a SQL insert statement using values from the Java entity.
      Parameters:
      statement - the prepared statement to set parameters for
      entity - the entity containing values to insert in the db
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • setUpdateStatement

      protected abstract void setUpdateStatement(PreparedStatement statement, T entity) throws SQLException
      Sets parameters for a SQL update statement using values from the entity.
      Parameters:
      statement - the prepared statement to set parameters for
      entity - the entity containing values to update in the corresponding db entry
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getCreateQuery

      protected String getCreateQuery()
      Helper method that builds an SQL INSERT query for this entity type. Uses the ordered attribute list to ensure consistent column order.
      Returns:
      a SQL INSERT statement with placeholders for values

    • getUpdateQuery

      protected String getUpdateQuery()
      Helper method that builds an SQL UPDATE query for this entity type. Uses the ordered attribute list to ensure consistent column order.
      Returns:
      a SQL UPDATE statement with placeholders for values and the ID for the WHERE clause

    • getDeleteQuery

      protected String getDeleteQuery()
      Helper method that builds an SQL DELETE query for this entity type. Uses the ID column from the entity mapper for the WHERE clause.
      Returns:
      a SQL DELETE statement with a placeholder for the ID to go in WHERE clause

    • getFindAllQuery

      protected String getFindAllQuery()
      Helper method that builds an SQL SELECT query to find all entities of this type.
      Returns:
      a SQL SELECT statement to retrieve all records

    • buildSelectQuery

      protected String buildSelectQuery(Map<String,String> dbAttributes)
      Helper method builds an SQL SELECT query with conditions based on the provided attributes. Takes a map of database fields and their values and turns them into 'column = ?' conditions joined by AND
      Parameters:
      dbAttributes - a Map of String pairs where the first String corresponds to the database field name and the second String corresponds to the value to filter by
      Returns:
      a SQL SELECT statement with placeholders for the attribute values

    • executeQueryForList

      protected List<T> executeQueryForList(String query, Object[] params) throws SQLException
      Executes a SQL query and maps the results to entities. Takes a complete SQL query string and parameter values , sets the values in the prepared statement and executes it. Maps the results to their corresponding Java entities
      Parameters:
      query - the SQL query to execute
      params - the parameter values to use in the query
      Returns:
      a list of entities matching the query
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • translateAttributeNames

      protected Map<String,String> translateAttributeNames(Map<String,String> attributes)
      Translates Java attribute names to database column names using the entity's mapper.
      Parameters:
      attributes - a Map of Strings where the first String corresponds to the Java entity attributes and the second String corresponds to the attribute's value
      Returns:
      a Map of Strings where the first String corresponds to the database column name and the second String corresponds to the field's value
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if an invalid attribute name is provided

    • create

      public boolean create(T entity)
      Creates a new entity in the database. Attempts to set the assigned autoincremented ID in the entity object.
      Specified by:
      create in interface GenericDAO<T>
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to create
      Returns:
      true if the entity was created successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if insert is a duplicate or if another database error occurs

    • update

      public boolean update(T entity)
      Updates an existing entity in the database.
      Specified by:
      update in interface GenericDAO<T>
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to update
      Returns:
      true if the entity was updated successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if a database error occurs

    • delete

      public boolean delete(Integer id)
      Deletes an entity from the database by ID. Ensures that foreign key constraints are enabled to properly cascade deletions.
      Specified by:
      delete in interface GenericDAO<T>
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the entity to delete
      Returns:
      true if the entity was deleted successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if foreign keys are not enabled or a database error occurs

    • findByID

      public Optional<T> findByID(Integer id)
      Finds an entity by its ID. Uses the findByAttributes method with a map containing just the ID.
      Specified by:
      findByID in interface GenericDAO<T>
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the entity to find
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found entity, or empty if not found
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if a database error occurs
      IllegalStateException - if it can't properly map id attribute to db field

    • findAll

      public List<T> findAll()
      Retrieves all entities of this type from the database.
      Specified by:
      findAll in interface GenericDAO<T>
      Returns:
      a list of all entities
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if a database error occurs

    • findByAttributes

      public Optional<T> findByAttributes(Map<String,String> attributes)
      Finds an entity by specific attribute values. Translates Java attribute names to database column names and builds a query.
      Parameters:
      attributes - a Map of Strings where the first String corresponds to entity attribute names and the second String corresponds to values to search for in db
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found entity, or empty if not found
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if a database error occurs

    • findAllByAttributes

      public List<T> findAllByAttributes(Map<String,String> attributes)
      Finds all entities matching specific attribute values. Translates Java attribute names to database column names and builds a query.
      Parameters:
      attributes - a Map of Strings where the first String corresponds to entity attribute names and the second String corresponds to values to search for in db
      Returns:
      a list of matching entities
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if a database error occurs
